channel.title: HEV - No Flatline Sound on Death
channel.description: It has been years after the game's release, and it seems that this Flatlining sound has not been fixed yet.

item.title: HEV - No Flatline Sound on Death
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
BMS DIGITAL SPORTS;1729828401697318487:

It’s one of those bugs from the engine port that we haven’t had time to look into yet. This stuff can be surprisingly layered. We’ll get to it…eventually.

https://steamcommunity.com/app/362890/discussions/0/358415206093902920/
